# Welcome to the Malaria Simulation Analyzer Website

This website provides tools for analyzing malaria simulation outputs. The analysis focuses on metrics such as population statistics, new clinical cases, parasite prevalence, and vector data.

Use the navigation bar at the top to explore different analysis sections, including the Inset Chart Analysis and Monthly PfPR Analysis.

For detailed documentation, refer to the [README](README.qmd).
